```
[Unit]
Description=Example timer unit

[Timer]
OnCalendar=*-*-* *:00,20,40
Unit=loggertest.service

[Install]
WantedBy=timers.target
```

```
[Unit]
Description=Example Test Service

[Service]
Type=oneshot
ExecStart=/usr/bin/logger -p local3.debug I\'m a logger
```
